pages.text: Welcome to the Project! The developers of Project Rankine, henceforth known as "We", are delighted for you to join the team. We realize that you may have many questions or at least waiting in anticipation for something to do. Hold on to those for now. Before you become acquainted with the objectives of the Project, there are a $(o)few$() changes that you must learn about first.
Please continue reading the other entries of this Preface chapter to start that process. But before that, here is a direct message from the developers: $(br2)$(o)Hello,
